alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 11 at 2:29AM MDT until October 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR MOST OF SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA NORTHEAST NEBRASKA AND NORTHWEST IOWA... The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Gregory, Charles Mix, Douglas, Hutchinson, Bon Homme and Yankton. * WINDS...For today southwest 15 to 25 mph becoming northwest 20 to 35 mph this afternoon. For Wednesday northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent today and as low as 27 percent on Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Yankton
